Title: Sahara
Writer: John Howard Lawson, Zoltan Korda, James O'Hanlon
Actors: Humphrey Bogart, Bruce Bennett, J. Carrol Naish
Plot: After the fall of Tobruk in 1942, during the Allied retreat in the Libyan desert, an American tank picks-up a motley group of survivors but they face advancing Germans and a lack of water.
